attributes.action: Stop Wasting Tax Payers Money Printing Government Forms In Any Other Language Than English
attributes.additional_details:
At a time when the Government is enforcing spending cuts and stealing money from our pockets at every given opportunity they continue to waste tens of millions of pounds of OUR money on producing documents in just about every langauge imaginable. If asylum speakers and imigrants cannot speak our language then they shouldn't be able to claim benefits as they are not available to work.
If you or I were not available to work then we couldn't claim any benefits
